description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has leveraged the Microsoft Graph API to perform various actions across Azure and M365 environments. They have also utilized AADInternals PowerShell Modules to access the API (Citation: MSTIC Nobelium Toolset May 2021)
